name: Simulator Hologram Hypnosis
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram Hypnosis.
Simulator Hologram Hypnosis - a simulation game where you can play on your phone like a 3D hologram of hypnosis. The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect! Want to friends were in a trance and hypnosis? Then our app for you!
Hologram fun app you can do different illusion of! Enter a joke friends hypnosis! Use hypnosis only in the right order!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones! The game is only an imitation of the hologram and hypnosis, so it is safe for your health!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave us your feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting!
